channel.title: Donator status
channel.description: I need help i know how to make someone owner/admin/mod but i do not know how to give someone the donator status

item.title: Donator status
item.dc:creator: @Rawr_is_me Rawr is me
item.description:
@Rawr_is_me wrote:

Alright thank you so much both of you

Read full topic

item.title: Donator status
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude462, post:5, topic:422728”][quote author=Rawr is me link=topic=525391.msg3824865#msg3824865 date=1322089866]

memberstatus or donator in the character file, depends on the base but that’s for pi
[/quote]alright i found that so do i add 1 or 2 or just type yes

You can add 1 or 2 or any number that is a solid number. 1 is usually normal donor, 2 would be like super donor.[/quote]

Just do 1. Doing Super Donator would mean you would have to add the Super Donator Rank too.

Or you can do donator points, instead of just a 1, or 2 ranking.

(i.e. 100 - 100 donator points, but then you’d have to make a donator item shop and change the amount of the items for the amount of points you want the item to be worth.)

Read full topic

item.title: Donator status
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?52140-Adding-Donator-Player-Right

Change the google.com to

r/u/n/e/l/o/c/u/s/./c/o/m/

without the /'s.

Read full topic
